title: The Dog and the Hides.
text: Once upon a time a number of Dogs, who were famished with hunger, saw some Hides steeping in a river, but couldnâ€™t get at them because the water was too deep. So they put their heads together, and decided to drink away at the river till it was shallow enough for them to reach the Hides. But long before that happened they burst themselves with drinking..
